item.title: 317 Creating firemaking + a couple questions (PLEASE ANSWER)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Uncalled:

Just use ctrl + f and look for emote, if you don’t find anything, look for animation.

I found something for Animation
This is my new code:

{ //By Skibblez deleteItem(1517, getItemSlot(1517), 1); startAnimation(733); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(30000, 11); }
But obviously for all logs and the other tinderbox.
Also i found pEmote (what ever that is)
this was the code:

{ //By Skibblez deleteItem(1517, getItemSlot(1517), 1); pEmote(733); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(30000, 11); }
Still nothing.
ANOTHER EDIT:
Well I found out how to get my character to start the animation.
This is how i found out how to make him do the animation, A moderator on my server was sittin next to me and i saw him do a command (::dance) Then i remembered, ::dance is a animation, lets look it up. Surely enough i was missing part of the code for my startAnimation.
This is what i currently have:

				else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1513)//magic
				{ //By Skibblez
					deleteItem(1513, getItemSlot(1513), 1);
					startAnimation(733);				
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					 makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
					addSkillXP(50000, 11);
				}

how do i get the animation to be faster then the 15 seconds it takes to do it?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Creating firemaking + a couple questions (PLEASE ANSWER)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Uncalled:

Show code.

//Firemaking if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1511)//Normal logs { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(100, 11); } if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1521)//oak { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1521, getItemSlot(1521), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(1000, 11); } if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1519)//willow { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1519, getItemSlot(1519), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(10000, 11); } if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1517)//maple { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1517, getItemSlot(1517), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(15000, 11); } if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1515)//yew { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1515, getItemSlot(1515), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(20000, 11); } if (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1513)//magic { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1513, getItemSlot(1513), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(25000, 11); } else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1511)//Normal logs { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(200, 11); } else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1521)//oak { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1521, getItemSlot(1521), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(2000, 11); } else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1519)//willow { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1519, getItemSlot(1519), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(20000, 11); } else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1517)//maple { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1517, getItemSlot(1517), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(30000, 11); } else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1515)//yew { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1515, getItemSlot(1515), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(40000, 11); } else if (itemUsed == 2946 && useWith == 1513)//magic { //By Skibblez deleteItem(1513, getItemSlot(1513), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); stillgfx(773, absY, absX); addSkillXP(50000, 11); }
I just recently changed all the else if’s in the second set (which is golden tin) from if.
Still doesn’t work
Sorry im asking all these questions. Im a bad coder and just trying to learn

item.title: 317 Creating firemaking + a couple questions (PLEASE ANSWER)
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:2, topic:397858”]addItem means that u are adding that item to ground, however to give it to you add

{ //By Skibblez deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); getItem(995, 5); //the object depends on what u want, but this will give u 5 gp in bank, but no fire addSkillXP(100, 11); }[/quote]

I fixed the code in the quote so he doesn’t get any errors.

Read full topic

addItem means that u are adding that item to ground, however to give it to you add

{ //By Skibblez deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); getItem(995, 5); (the object depends on what u want, but this will give u 5 gp in bank, but no fire) addSkillXP(100, 11); }

item.title: 317 Creating firemaking + a couple questions (PLEASE ANSWER)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is both simple AND hard at the same time. I’m making firemaking on my server from scratch, and i need to know how to make the fire show up on ground (object id, etc…) the way im doing this is by using this method: "usedwithslot: " + usedWithSlot + " itemusedslot: ". looks something like this in the server files:

if (itemUsed == 5340 && useWith == 5312) { //By System deleteItem(5312, getItemSlot(5312), 1); addItem(995, 5); addSkillXP(15, 19); }
I need to know how to make it remove the logs (already done) NOT add anything else in the invotory (i think i just leave the addItem part out of the code) and then have the logs show up on the ground already on fire (like in real rs).

And if possible, can someone tell me how to fix my runecrafting skill? (it only crafts in one section, not from any side) and if possible, can someone tell me the object ID of the water alter? thats the alter i use for my RSPS.
Last thing. What is the Gfx for using the tinderbox and lighting a fire???
THANX
Please dont flame

EDIT: This is what i have so far:

{ //By Skibblez deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(995, 5); addSkillXP(100, 11); }
how do i get it to add a fire on the ground. not 5gp?
NOTE:
addObject doesn’t work lol

Read full topic
item.source: 317 Creating firemaking + a couple questions (PLEASE ANSWER)
